item.title: 36C3 CTF Writeups
item.description: 1337 skills Task description: It’s too hard to gain all 1337 h4x0r skills required by nowadays CTFs ._.! I am glad a friendly hacker told me about an App he got during a (growth) hacking course. Sadly, he didn’t wrote down any activations codes. Ready for your hacking exam? As can be read above, an Android app was given at the beginning of the challenge, with the hint to get a valid activation code for it.
